r.s: Implementation of the Yadis Specification 1.0 protocol for PHP5.
r.d: Implementation of the Yadis Specification 1.0 protocol allowing a client to discover a list of Services a Yadis Identity Provider offers.
r.n: Request #12226 - Renamed AllTests (PHPUnit3 / PEAR wide test suite) Bug #12973 Broken code in Yadis.php, lines 305-307 Bug #12974 Fatal error: Call to undefined method Services_Yadis::_getHttpRequest()
